about_the_game:
SMASH BALL is a high-speed hybrid of arcade-style air-hockey played with customizable mech athletes.

Destroy your opponents LITERALLY.

Launch rockets, throw sticky bombs, anything goes in the SMASH BALL arena if it means winning.

SMASH BALL can be played with or against friends. Enter tournaments and manage your team, resources, and booster cards to retain sponsors, grow your fan base and win.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
